title: Share Health Economic Model Datasets
text: illustrate share data using ready4use classes methods, first need data publish. example, going share X, Ready4useDyad (data structure explained another vignette) can create using data ingested online repository.
code: objects_ls <- ingest(Ready4useRepos(dv_nm_1L_chr = "fakes",                                     dv_ds_nm_1L_chr = "https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/HJXYKQ",                                     dv_server_1L_chr = "dataverse.harvard.edu",                                     gh_repo_1L_chr = "ready4-dev/ready4",                                     gh_tag_1L_chr = "Documentation_0.0"),                      fls_to_ingest_chr = c("ymh_clinical_tb","ymh_clinical_dict_r3"),                      metadata_1L_lgl = F) X <- Ready4useDyad(ds_tb = objects_ls$ymh_clinical_tb,                    dictionary_r3 = objects_ls$ymh_clinical_dict_r3) %>%   renew()

title: Share Health Economic Model Datasets
text: now specify plan publish X Y, Ready4useRepos object (described another vignette). Note, must write permissions repositories specify step. values entered example (https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/W95KED dataset fakes dataverse work ). can now upload X preferred data repository using share method. default, one data repository specified Y, dataverse repository preferred sharing. can overwrite default passing either “prefer_gh” “” values type_1L_chr argument. Ready4useDyad object now available download https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/W95KED.

Note this example uses fake data.")

text: can inspect X printing selected information console using exhibit method. wish see first last records, can pass “head” “tail” display_1L_chr argument. Data Dictionary
code: exhibit(X,          display_1L_chr = "head",          scroll_box_args_ls = list(width = "100%")) X <- renew(X,            type_1L_chr = "label") exhibit(X,         display_1L_chr = "head",          scroll_box_args_ls = list(width = "100%")) X <- renew(X,            type_1L_chr = "unlabel") exhibit(X,         display_1L_chr = "head",         type_1L_chr = "dict",         scroll_box_args_ls = list(width = "100%"))
